content.rendered:
• The extension ladder is for you who want a flexible ladder for different heights. The extension ladder is in many ways reminiscent of a single ladder, but with the advantage that it has multiple ladder elements. It can therefore be extended to a higher working height, while maintaining its compact transport dimensions.
  • The extension ladder is easily adjusted in height with the integrated locking mechanism, which ensures, that it locks automatically when it is extended to the desired length.
  • The beams are made of fiberglass, making it suitable for work that involves electricity of up to 20,000V per m2. The ladder is manufactured using press-fit technology, that reinforces the joints. You are thus sure to have a ladder for many years to come.
  • All rungs are surface treated and non-slip. The ladder is fitted with non-slip ladder shoes, which makes it stand firm and secure on the ground. The ladder is delivered with stabilizer.

excerpt.rendered:
Material Glasfiber/aluminium
Ladder length 3.7M(single) 7.4M (double).
Rung 2×12 steps
Type Skyde- og hejsestiger
Weight 12,7 kg.
